sentences.sContent: One of them chopped through the planks with her axe.
sentences.sContent_eng: One of them chopped through the planks with her axe.
sentences.sCn: 其中一人用她的斧头劈开了那些木板。

sentences.sContent: And so do I. I heard the fall of the axe in that sound.
sentences.sContent_eng: And so do I. I heard the fall of the axe in that sound.
sentences.sCn: 我也怀疑。我在那一片喧嚣之中听到了斧头落下的声音。

phrases.pCn: 另有所图；有不同意见；别有用心

trans.tranOther: a tool with a heavy metal blade on the end of a long handle, used to cut down trees or split pieces of wood
